zh.title: 西班牙胡安·卡洛斯一世登基
美国总统里根否决民权法案
美国“深水地平线”钻井平台发生爆炸
卡塔尔多哈世乒联男子总决赛落幕

en.title: Prince Juan Carlos became acting head of state of Spain.
El Salvador and Honduras signed a peace treaty ending their border conflict.
Space Shuttle Challenger STS-61-A launched, carrying Spacelab D-1.
Quebec referendum on sovereignty narrowly rejected independence.
Hurricane Wilma made landfall in Florida as a Category 3 storm.
Myanmar adopted a new national flag and name change to Republic of the Union of Myanmar.
Colectiv nightclub fire in Bucharest killed 64, leading to government protests.
NASA's OSIRIS-REx spacecraft successfully touched down on asteroid Bennu.
